languages.text: "Смута у нас, Ваш высокобродие! Вооруженное восстание в столице и провинциях. Сначала нижние уровни полыхнули, затем вверх по шпилям поползло — по {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс-узлам{/g} ударили, по арсеналам, станции маг-поездов".

traits.locale_text: "Смута у нас, Ваш высокобродие! Вооруженное восстание в столице и провинциях. Сначала губернаторский дворец полыхнул, затем в городе началось — по {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс-узлам{/g} ударили, по арсеналам, станция маг-поездов".

languages.text: "Unrest, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Armed rebellions in both the capital and the provinces. First the lower levels sparked, then it went up the spires — they hit the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-hubs{/g}, the arsenals, the mag-train stations."
languages.original_text: "Смута у нас, Ваш высокобродие! Вооруженное восстание в столице и провинциях. Сначала нижние уровни полыхнули, затем вверх по шпилям поползло — по {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс-узлам{/g} ударили, по арсеналам, станции маг-поездов".

traits.locale_text: "Unrest, {mf|sir|ma'am}! An armed rebellion in both the capital and the provinces. First the lower levels sparked, then it went up the spires — they hit the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-hubs{/g}, the arsenals, the mag-train stations."

"Unrest, {mf|sir|ma'am}! An armed rebellion in both the capital and the provinces. First the lower levels sparked, then it went up the spires — they hit the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-hubs{/g}, the arsenals, the mag-train stations."

"Unrest, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Armed rebellions in both the capital and the provinces. First the lower levels sparked, then it went up the spires — they hit the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-hubs{/g}, the arsenals, the mag-train stations."

"Unrest, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Armed rebellions in both the capital and the provinces. First the lower levels sparked, then it went up the spires — they hit the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-hubs{/g}, the arsenals, the mag-train stations."

"Unrest, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Armed rebellions in both the capital and the provinces. First the lower levels sparked, then it went up the spires — they hit the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-hubs{/g}, the arsenals, the mag-train stations."

"Unrest, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Armed rebellions in both the capital and the provinces. First the lower levels sparked, then it went up the spires — they hit the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-hubs{/g}, the arsenals, the mag-train stations."

languages.text: "Ein Aufstand, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Bewaffnete Rebellionen in der Hauptstadt und in den Provinzen. Das Feuer hat sich auf den unteren Ebenen entzündet und sich dann die Türme hinaufgearbeitet — zu den {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox-Zentralen{/g}, den Arsenalen, den Magnetzug-Stationen."
languages.original_text: "Unrest, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Armed rebellions in both the capital and the provinces. First the lower levels sparked, then it went up the spires — they hit the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-hubs{/g}, the arsenals, the mag-train stations."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Aufstand, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Bewaffnete Rebellionen in der Hauptstadt und in den Provinzen. Das Feuer hat sich auf den unteren Ebenen entzündet und sich dann die Türme hinaufgeabeitet — zu den {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox-Zentralen{/g}, den Arsenalen, den Magnetzug-Stationen."

languages.text: « C'est le chaos, {mf|monsieur|madame} ! Des émeutes éclatent dans la capitale et dans toutes les provinces. Ça a commencé par les niveaux inférieurs et c'est monté jusqu'en haut des tours. Ils s'en prennent aux {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}centraux-vox{/g}, aux arsenaux et aux gares. »
languages.original_text: "Unrest, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Armed rebellions in both the capital and the provinces. First the lower levels sparked, then it went up the spires — they hit the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-hubs{/g}, the arsenals, the mag-train stations."

traits.locale_text: « C'est le chaos, {mf|monsieur|madame} ! Des émeutes éclatent dans la capitale et dans toutes les provinces. Ça a commencé par les niveaux inférieurs et c'est monté jusqu'en haut des tours. Ils s'en prennent aux {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}centraux-vox{/g}, aux arsenaux et aux gares. »

languages.text: “是暴乱，长官！首都和各行省都发生了武装叛乱。先是底层发生爆炸，然后是尖塔区域！{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}通讯{/g}枢纽、军火库和大型磁力列车站也都遭到了袭击。”
languages.original_text: "Unrest, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Armed rebellions in both the capital and the provinces. First the lower levels sparked, then it went up the spires — they hit the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-hubs{/g}, the arsenals, the mag-train stations."

traits.locale_text: “是暴乱，长官！首都和各行省都发生了武装叛乱。先是底层发生爆炸，然后是尖塔区域！{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}通讯{/g}枢纽、军火库和大型磁力列车站也都遭到了袭击。”

languages.text: 「動揺が広がっています！首都と地方の両方で武器を持って反乱が起きました。まず下層部で火花が散って、次に{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクスハブ{/g}、磁力列車の武器庫がやられたのです」
languages.original_text: "Unrest, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Armed rebellions in both the capital and the provinces. First the lower levels sparked, then it went up the spires — they hit the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-hubs{/g}, the arsenals, the mag-train stations."

traits.locale_text: 「動揺が広がっています！首都と地方の両方で武器を持って反乱が起きました。まず下層部で火花が散って、次に{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクスハブ{/g}、磁力列車の武器庫がやられたのです」

languages.text: «¡Disturbios! Revueltas armadas tanto en la capital como en las provincias. Primero estallaron los niveles inferiores, luego subieron por las torres y alcanzaron los {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}centros voco{/g}, los arsenales, las estaciones de magnetotrén».
languages.original_text: "Unrest, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Armed rebellions in both the capital and the provinces. First the lower levels sparked, then it went up the spires — they hit the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-hubs{/g}, the arsenals, the mag-train stations."

traits.locale_text: «¡Disturbios!». Revueltas armadas tanto en la capital como en las provincias. Primero estallaron los niveles inferiores, luego subieron por las torres y alcanzaron los {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}centros voco{/g}, los arsenales, las estaciones de magnetotrén».

languages.text: "İsyan çıktı efendim! Hem başkent hem de diğer vilayetlerde silahlı isyanlar var. Alt kademelerde başladı, sonra hızını alamayıp en tepeye kadar sıçradı. {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voks merkezlerini{/g}, cephanelikleri ve manyetik tren istasyonlarını vurdular."
languages.original_text: "Unrest, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Armed rebellions in both the capital and the provinces. First the lower levels sparked, then it went up the spires — they hit the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-hubs{/g}, the arsenals, the mag-train stations."

traits.locale_text: "İsyan çıktı efendim! Hem başkent hem de diğer vilayetlerde silahlı isyanlar var. Alt kademelerde başladı, sonra hızını alamayıp en tepeye kadar sıçradı. {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voks merkezleri{/g}ni, cephanelikleri ve manyetik tren istasyonlarını vurdular."
